text: Konstantinos Tasoulas (; born 17 July 1959) is a Greek politician and lawyer who has been the President-elect of Greece since 2025. He was the Speaker of the Hellenic Parliament from 18 July 2019 to 16 January 2025. He was a member of the Member of the Hellenic Parliament from 2000 to 2025. ==President of Greece== In January 2025, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis submitted to the Parliament for approval the candidacy of Tasoulas for the office of the Greek Presidency. Tasoulas accepted the nomination, which was met with criticism from the opposition. He was elected by the Parliament on 12 February 2025. ==Personal life== Tasoulas was born in Ioannina, Greece on 17 July 1959. He studied at the Athens Law School of National and Kapodistrian University of Athens. He worked as a lawyer in Athens and London. Tasoulas is married to Fani Stathopoulou and they have two children. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Hellenic Parliament Category:Mayors Category:Presidents of Greece Category:Greek lawyers Category:Government ministers of Greece
